description: St. Andrew on an X-shaped cross at center; soldier on horseback at right and grieving figures left; cherubs above; from John Young's "A Catalog of Pictures at Leigh Court near Bristol, the Seat of Philip John Miles Esq. M.P." 1822

title: The Martyrdom of St. Andrew
